subject: Re: Thank you for your recent application, we are ready to lend you some cash
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$315,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://doubleransalt.com/
